Weapon of the Dwarf-Father.name: Weapon of the Dwarf-Father
Weapon of the Dwarf-Father.flavor: Your weapon glows with the power of Moradinâ€™s forge.
Weapon of the Dwarf-Father.effect: Weapon attacks made with the target weapon deal fire and radiant damage instead of their normal damage types. Additionally, the weapon emits bright light in all squares within 15 squares of you. This effect lasts until you end it as a free action or until you end your turn and are not holding the target weapon.

Forge Fire Blast.name: Forge Fire Blast
Forge Fire Blast.flavor: Your weapon glows bright with the heat of the Soulforge. It hurtles into one enemy, and then releases a searing blast of celestial fire.
Forge Fire Blast.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
Forge Fire Blast.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 3 squares of the primary target.
Forge Fire Blast.secondaryOnHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage, and the secondary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Soul of the Dwarf-Father.name: Soul of the Dwarf-Father
Soul of the Dwarf-Father.flavor: You call out to Moradin, praying for his greatest blessings. Your body and weapon glow with astral light that sears your enemies and drives them back.
Soul of the Dwarf-Father.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier fire and radiant damage.
Soul of the Dwarf-Father.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your attacks deal extra fire and radiant damage equal to your Wisdom modifier, and enemies treat all squares adjacent to you as difficult terrain.

Tempered.name: Tempered
Tempered.flavor: Like adamantine forged in the Soulforge, you are unbreakable.
Tempered.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Tempered.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to Fortitude and Will until the end of your next turn, and a +5 power bonus to your next saving throw made before the end of the encounter.
